mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.parent_id AS "parent.id", p.name AS "parent.name", a.parent_ids AS "parentIds", a.name AS "name", a.logo AS "logo", a.sort AS "sort", a.trigger_direction AS "triggerDirection", a.trigger_type AS "triggerType", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", uu.name AS "updateBy.name", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN sys_user uu ON uu.id = a.update_by LEFT JOIN mod_occasion_category p ON p.id = a.parent_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mod_occasion_category( id, parent_id, parent_ids, name, logo, sort, trigger_direction, trigger_type, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{parent.id}, #{parentIds}, #{name}, #{logo}, #{sort}, #{triggerDirection}, #{triggerType}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE mod_occasion_category SET parent_id = #{parent.id}, parent_ids = #{parentIds}, name = #{name}, logo = #{logo}, sort=#{sort}, trigger_direction=#{triggerDirection}, trigger_type=#{triggerType}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE mod_occasion_category SET del_flag = #{DEL_FLAG_DELETE} WHERE id = #{id} OR parent_ids LIKE '%,'||#{id}||',%' '%,'+#{id}+',%' CONCAT('%,', #{id}, ',%')
